description: Mimiru is a female Heavyblade who appears in .hack//Sign. Her avatar appears as a teenage girl dressed in an armored bikini top, and a short skirt, with large greaves on her legs. Mimiru plays as a "tough-it-out-through-anything" player, who is poor at planning things out and following through on them. She meets Tsukasa and soon becomes one of the few he trusts and he eventually sees her as a friend. She also teams up with Bear, who she refers to as an "old man", and spends considerable time in the series attempting to figure out what Bear`s career is in real life.
name: Mimiru
